info.title: ModelsLab Interior API
info.description: AI-powered interior design and architectural visualization API

post.description: Create an interior design from an image using this endpoint
Generate a rendered image of a floor plan for a room based on the provided input
This endpoint helps decorate a room according to the prompt provided
This endpoint allows you to change the environment scenario to check how house will look in different scenario
This endpoint allows you to convert exterior house sketch into real world photo as per prompt
This endpoint allows you to convert bad exterior to good exterior

Fetch Queued Request API fetches queued request. Usually more complex image generation requests take more time for processing. Such requests are being queued for processing and the output Images are retrievable after some time.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the generation to fetch

key.description: Your API Key used for authenticating your request

prompt.description: A text prompt describing the content you want in the generated interior image

init_image.description: A URL to the initial image of the room to base the design on

negative_prompt.description: Descriptions of elements to avoid in the image (e.g., NSFW content, poor quality, distorted features)

strength.description: The degree to which the prompt influences the initial image. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of the initial image details

base64.description: Specifies whether the response should be returned as a base64 string. Defaults to false

num_inference_steps.description: The number of denoising steps. Acceptable values are 21, 31, or 41

guidance_scale.description: The scale for classifier-free guidance. Minimum is 1, and maximum is 20

temp.description: Indicates if temporary links should be used, valid for 24 hours. Defaults to false

seed.description: Seed for reproducibility. The same seed generates the same image. Use null for a random seed

scale_down.description: Scale down parameter for image processing

webhook.description: A URL to receive a POST API call once the image generation is complete

track_id.description: An ID returned in the API response, used to identify the webhook request

key.description: Your API Key used for authenticating your request

prompt.description: A text prompt describing the content you want in the generated floor plan image

init_image.description: A URL to the initial image of the room to base the floor plan on

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompts are descriptions of things we don't want in our image. Examples include NSFW content, extra limbs, distorted faces, poor quality, or anything else we want to avoid

strength.description: The degree to which the prompt influences the initial image. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of the initial image details

num_inference_steps.description: The number of denoising steps. Acceptable values are 21, 31, or 41

guidance_scale.description: The scale for classifier-free guidance. Minimum is 1, and maximum is 20

temp.description: Indicates if temporary links should be used, valid for 24 hours. Defaults to false

seed.description: Seed is used to reproduce results, same seed will give you same image in return again. Pass null for a random number

webhook.description: A URL to receive a POST API call once the image generation is complete

track_id.description: An ID returned in the API response, used to identify the webhook request
